answers.answer: Hi, welcome to the forum, there are many causes of burning hands and feet some of them are deficiency of vitamin B12 . It can be seen in patients with atopic or allergic dermatitis. It is usually seen secondary to exposure to allergen and subsequent reaction is mediated by IgE antibodies. Nerve injury, trauma to nerve etc can also cause burning.The other possibilities are diabetes, alcoholism, mal absorption syndrome etc. This can be prevented by taking meat liver which is a rich source. Otherwise oral and inject able preparations are available. I suggest you to consult physician for further evaluation and treatment of and Vitamin B12 deficiency. Take care and regards.
